name: .454 6-round speedloader
description: This speedloader can hold 6 rounds of .454 and quickly reload a compatible revolver.

name: .454 8-round speedloader
description: This speedloader can hold 8 rounds of .454 and quickly reload a compatible revolver.

name: Eagle 1776 magazine
description: An american-made box magazine, designed to deliver 24 .44 Magnum cartridges to the Eagle 1776.
